column1: Both males and females may have chlamydia without having any symptoms.
You are more likely to become infected with chlamydia if you have: - Sex without using a condom - Had multiple sexual partners - Been infected with chlamydia before
Most women do not have symptoms.
All of your sexual partners must take the antibiotics, even if they do not have symptoms.
Because gonorrhea often occurs with chlamydia, treatment for gonorrhea is often given at the same time.
